Name: Peter
description:
Peter is married with three school-age children. He is an enterprising man who deals in various businesses for a living. He does farming alongside operating an electronics shop for daily income and efficient sustainability.

Peter's electronics business is not doing well because he is lacking several electronics that are needed by locals in the area. This has given him low returns in the business.

For this reason he is seeking a loan to stock the shop with a variety of electronics to increase his client base and increase his sales and income. In the picture, he is seen standing with a credit officer who is wearing blue trousers on the right.
